parameters.jsonBody: {"replyToken":"={{ $json.replyToken }}","messages":[{"type":"flex","altText":"={{ $(\"Extract Data\").item.json.title }}","contents":{"type":"bubble","body":{"type":"box","layout":"vertical","contents":[{"type":"text","text":"={{ $(\"Extract Data\").item.json.title }}","weight":"bold"},{"type":"text","text":"={{ $(\"Extract Data\").item.json.startAt }}"}]},"footer":{"type":"box","layout":"horizontal","contents":[{"type":"button","action":{"type":"postback","data":"going:=${{$json.id}}","label":"参加する"}},{"type":"button","action":{"type":"postback","data":"maybe:=${{$json.id}}","label":"検討中"}},{"type":"button","action":{"type":"postback","data":"mute:=${{$json.id}}","label":"聞かせて"}}]}}}]}
